question: Was there a muslim saint by the name of Khabir?
answer:
QUESTION
Asalamualikum. I've recently heard of a muslim saint by the name of Khabir from a non muslim. Certain things that was mentioned I did not agree upon. If there was such a person, please can you elaborate of what kind of personality he had and were would I find more information on this Person. Please try not to be brief (the more info the better)
ANSWER


Share:
We are unaware of such a person and have not come across any of his works. Therefore we are unable to comment about his personality and his views.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
